actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

official_title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place of holding court for the District of Arizona.

summary.text: Amends the federal judicial code to add Flagstaff as a location where court will be held for the District of Arizona.

titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place of holding court for the District of Arizona.
